fields.name: Pox Arcana
fields.description: +100 Ability Power +100% Base Mana Regen +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Pox: Damaging spells apply a stack of Pox (max of 5) to enemy champions hit for 10 seconds. UNIQUE Active - Disease Harvest: Deals 100 magic damage plus 20 (+5% of Ability Power) per stack of Pox to all nearby enemies affected by Pox, and restores 5% of maximum mana to the caster per stack of Pox on enemies hit (60 second cooldown). ''Wealth, land, secrets, love; how little they cherish when their bodies betray them.''
